text.div:
Hantavirus Infection (Tests for Hantavirus Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    7899-8 Hantavirus RNA [Presence] in Serum by NAA with probe detection
    86520-4 Hantavirus RNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
    86536-0 Hantavirus RNA [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by NAA with probe detection
    86537-8 Hantavirus RNA [Presence] in Tissue by NAA with probe detection
    86538-6 Hantavirus RNA [Presence] in Urine by NAA with probe detection
    88216-7 Hantavirus puumala RNA [Presence] in Urine by NAA with probe detection
    88220-9 Hantavirus puumala RNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
    91130-5 Hantavirus RNA [Presence] in Lower respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
